title: BIM Quests
description: A gamified IFC viewer â€” an exploration game built inside IFC/BIM models with first-person and third-person modes. Navigate through architectural designs, inspect building elements, and explore 3D spaces interactively.

title: Kuhn-Munkres Algorithm
description: A Python implementation of the Hungarian Method for solving assignment problems in polynomial time. Features an interactive Tkinter GUI for matrix input and real-time solving.

title: Octopus
description: An open-source SDK and scaffold for building BIM applications with .NET 9. Includes a Blazor component library with 3D IFC viewer, a REST API server for model management, and supports standalone or full-platform modes.

title: Electron.js Revit Add-in
description: An MVC multi-process-architectured Revit add-in where the View layer is an Electron.js app communicating with the Revit add-in through named pipes IPC.

title: WexThreeJS
description: A React Three.js library for viewing WexBIM 3D models. Provides reusable components including a 3D viewer, toolbar, and built-in controls for displaying and interacting with building models.
